id: The real reason Trump is talking about pre-existing conditions
paragraph: By Tami Luhby, CNNUpdated 6:19 PM ET, Wed October 24, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)On the campaign trail. In television ads. On Twitter. Everyone -- even the President -- is suddenly talking about pre-existing conditions.Republicans will totally protect people with Pre-Existing Conditions, Democrats will not! Vote Republican.
